subject: RE: [junit] JUnit and Ant: stack trace filtering
msgSnippet: --On Thursday, December 06, 2001 17:58:34 +1000 Robert Watkins ... In this case, it was mentioning which test methods that failed, something like: 100 tests
messageBody:
--On Thursday, December 06, 2001 17:58:34 +1000 Robert Watkins
<robertw@...> wrote:

> The TestCase is the lowest level of granularity supported by JUnit. It's
> the actual test method that will be invoked. It either succeeds or it
> fails.

In this case, it was mentioning which test methods that failed, something
like:

100 tests run, 2 failed:
TestCase.testThisFailed
TestCase.testThisAlsoFailed
